webBgTitle.message: Site Background Images (Select one or more, up to 5)

uploadImageTip.message: Image Formats: png, bmp, jpg, jpeg, gif; Size: up to 5MB; Width x Height: 1920x1080 px or larger (smaller images will be still displayed in its original dimension and placed in the center of the page).

uploadImageOrder.message: The images will be displayed in the order you upload them.

linkTip.message: Notes: You can add up to 10 links; link name up to 20 characters. You can drag to move links to reorder them.

linkNamePlaceholder.message: Click to enter the link name

linkFormatPlaceholder.message: Click to enter the link URL in the format of http://

resetConfirm.message: When you restore the default style, the custom style will be cleared, are you sure you want to restore it?

badgeTip.message: Formats: png, bmp, jpg, gif; Size: up to 2 MB; Suggested width x height: 120x120 px

editFriendLink.description: 点击底部编辑页脚的按钮，会弹出一个弹框，弹框的标题
